item.title: Purwanchal Digital Media Technologies Pvt.Ltd
item.description: We are a team of well-experienced professionals with a proven track record in the web based development and related services. We have been designing the websites and providing various web related services including after sales services to a variety of businesses and customers. Our objective is to provide a quality service at an affordable rate and build upon our goodwill by offering unmatched customer satisfaction.

item.title: Websoft Nepal
item.description: WebSoft Nepal is a leading Web & Software services company in Chitwan, promoted by well qualified experienced IT professionals dedicated to provide a wide range of customized business solutions to its valued clients. We deal with Web Interface Design, Portal Development, Web Application Programming, Graphics Media Design, Photography, Business promotions as well as Reliable Web Hosting & Domain Services. Making use of newly introduced technologies, our team diligently strives to develop, standardize & promote the interface that is cost-effective & profitable on long term run. As latest technology innovation, we are integrating different services like SMS Gateways & Mobile based applications which help you to communicate with the world in easier and well-managed way. We are operating our major Web Design Center from Narayangarh, Chitwan, which is located in Mid Region of Nepal.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Thakur International
item.description: “Thakur International” is the internationally approach and research based organization in the field of innovation. We propose to provide high quality full-service along with support to clients on every project. Our proposed services focus in providing web services, virtual support and service to the company. We are the Business process outsourcing (BPO), we involve in the operations and responsibilities of specific business functions of your organization.

item.title: Star Advertising Agency
item.description: From the desk of CEO Welcome to the fascinated world of Stars. As an aggressive and agile firm, we believe in the fundamentals of communication strategies and have developed a reputation for effective, on-target marketing. We are known for building and positioning brands and maximizing the exposure and response to our client's marketing efforts. The delight in the faces of our customers is our reward and it has brought long lasting relationship with them and makes us their partners in progress. We have a clear combination of business strategy and workforce strategy to encounter the real challenges confronting us in the competitive world. With best wished to all. Raj Kumar Das Services A) Media Management - Advertorial Support (Print Media Ads) - Best Timing & Rates - News Coverage - Optimum Satisfaction & Benefits Creative Execution - Outdoor Advertising - Hoarding Boards (Designing/Stalling) - Wall Painting - Street Banners - Electronic Media Ads (Television & Radio Commercials) - Web designing & publishing - Stall / Stage Designing C) Event Management - Product Launch - Press Conference - Seminars - Exhibitions/Fairs D) Desktop Publication - Brochure/ Posters/Pamphlets Designing & Printing - AGM Reports/Study Reports/Prospectus - Books & Magazine Designing & Printing - All kind of desktop publishing related services.
